page.shortlink: api extension namespace bson class create temp result set method
page.description: Creates a temporary BSON file from a resultset, then apply an order and optional options (and columns) to get a new open resultset that modifys the order.
page.prototype: .CreateTempResultSet as SQL::ResultSet (resultSet as P [, orderExpression as C [, options as C [, columns as C]]])
